name: Backpack Brawl
summary:
Explore the immersive world of Backpack Brawl - a dynamic inventory management 2D auto-battle strategy game.

Unleash your strategic prowess as you purchase and craft potent items to achieve success in the game. Keep the momentum going by growing your inventory, expand your backpack capacity, and adapt to any challenges that lie ahead.

Placement matters! Putting the right items next to each other makes all the difference. Play smart and you'll do well.

Play against other players. You play against other players who have had the same opportunities as you. See what they come up with, and counter them! You might even learn some new tricks looking at what they do.

Choose between multiple Heroes to help shape your available items and inventory and choose the direction you like! Are you a spell-slinging elementalist? A hardy warrior? A long range marksman? As more heroes join the Brawl, the heroes you meet only get more challenging.

Fight your way to the top of the rankings!
